io.github.pustike.eventbus

Class DefaultSubscriberLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.pustike.eventbus.DefaultSubscriberLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubscriberLoader

    public class DefaultSubscriberLoader
extends Object
implements SubscriberLoader
    Default Cache that uses ConcurrentHashMap to store subscribeMethods and eventType hierarchy.
